metadata.title: USN-5149-1 -- AccountsService vulnerability
metadata.description: Kevin Backhouse discovered that AccountsService incorrectly handled memory when performing certain language setting operations. A local attacker could use this issue to escalate privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5149-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  accountsservice - 0.6.55-0ubuntu12~20.04.5 gir1.2-accountsservice-1.0 - 0.6.55-0ubuntu12~20.04.5 libaccountsservice-doc - 0.6.55-0ubuntu12~20.04.5 libaccountsservice-dev - 0.6.55-0ubuntu12~20.04.5 libaccountsservice0 - 0.6.55-0ubuntu12~20.04.5 No subscription required
